TestReportSteps.testObjective: Verify that export to excel functionality in Export Crash Page is working as expected.
TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to open crash accordion.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to open crash accordion.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to open crash accordion.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to select all fields in crash.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to select all fields in crash.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to select all fields in crash.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to click the button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to click the button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to click the button.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to click the button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to click the button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to click the button.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to click the button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to click the button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to click the button.

TestReportSteps.stepDescription: Verify that excel file is exported.Capture screenshot.
TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to verify that excel file is exported.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to verify that excel file is exported.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to verify that excel file is exported.

TestReportSteps.stepDescription: Verify that the data is valid in exported file.
TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to verify that the data is valid in exported file.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to verify that the data is valid in exported file.
